descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][b]                                                                                           [size=6] [/size][/b][/color][color=#00ff00][size=6]ZYZ[/size][/color][color=#00ff00][b]

Players home[/b].

[/color]You can teleport to [color=#00ff00]ZYZ[/color], see picture for info on location for [color=#00ff00]ZYZ[/color], click on [color=#00ff00]ZYZ[/color] on map then teleport.

I have tested the navmesh with a follower and encountered no problems.


[b][color=#00ff00]Requirements:[/color][/b] Dawnguard.Hearthfire.Dragonborn.


[color=#00ff00][b]Installation:[/b] [/color]  Just download with Nexus mod manger, Mod organizer or manual,if you want to install it manually,then you have to extract it into your data                        file for Skyrim.


[color=#00ff00][b]Unistallation:[/b] [/color] Just untick in mod manger or mod organzier or delete the files you manually installed.



[b][color=#00ff00]CREDITS: Many thanks to      "cad435 for Snow Elves Remastered"  
[/color][/b][b][color=#00ff00]         [/color][/b][b][color=#00ff00]                                   "Varlaisaran for his Adabala Building System - Ayleid Transfusion"[/color][/b]                                        


[b][color=#00ff00]Cleaned with TES5Edit. [/color]        


[/b][color=#ff7700]I hope you enjoy the home.

My Regards to you all.

Thank You.[/color]
author: tanyferan
